files.title: Claude-Powered No-Code Website Builder
files.description: A revolutionary no-code website builder that integrates Claude AI to help users create, customize, and optimize websites through natural language interactions. Users can describe what they want, and Claude generates the appropriate components, layouts, and styling in real-time.

files.name: config.md
files.title: Website Builder Configuration Guide
files.description: The Website Builder uses a JSON configuration file (`wb-config.json`) to control various aspects of the build process, export options, and advanced features. This document explains all available configuration settings and their usage.

files.name: fixes.md
files.title: Fixes Log
files.description: Original goal was to create a way for anyone to create a website from options, style it, and download it. While we built excellent technical infrastructure (MCP integration, TypeScript, reusable components), we hadn't completed the user-facing website builder experience.
